txt.en:
Tham Nambarth is the nearest of the ruined estates and our first priority. While the threats to it are not great, they must not be trivialized in their importance, for Tham Nambarth is being reclaimed by nature itself.

Tham Nambarth was once a great hall... you can see that in what still stands today. This will not be the case for long, though, and not because of looters or goblins. It is the ivy! It grows deep into the cracks in the walls and slowly pushes the bricks apart until nothing is left standing.

It is also threatened by a source that itself is not threatening: a herd of elk has settled within its walls. They are not a problem of themselves; however, soon they will bring predators: wolves, hungry robbers, Wargs, and goblins from the northern hills.
Tham Nambarth is the most well-kept of the estates that lie in ruin within the Twilight Fields.
Tore down ivy at Tham Nambarth ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Tham Nambarth is in the Twilight Fields, east of Tinnudir.\n\nOrchalwÃ«'s journal details several things that are currently assailing the ruins of Tham Nambarth.
